channel.title: Customer Service, IoT, Nokia, Withings on David G. Simmons
channel.description: Recent content in Customer Service, IoT, Nokia, Withings on David G. Simmons

item.title: How Nokia has Blown the Withings Acquisition
item.description: I’m not usually one to publicly take a company to task like this, but, well, this is a rather special circumstance. I’ve been an avid Withings fan, and advocate, for years. I was one of the very first people to get a Withings Activit√© watch. Since then, I’ve actually invested pretty heavily in Withings gear. I bought my wife a Withings Pop. I bough a Withings Body Analyzer Scale. I bought a Withings Wireless Blood pressure Cuff.
